LanguageData.PlasticBasicResearch.label: basic plastic
LanguageData.PlasticBasicResearch.description: Lightweight bio-plastic from plant materials. Basic-grade material suitable for simple furniture and structures.
LanguageData.PlasticIndustrialResearch.label: industrial plastic
LanguageData.PlasticIndustrialResearch.description: Advanced bio-plastic with enhanced durability. Industrial-grade material for high-quality furniture and robust structures.
LanguageData.PlasticFiberResearch.label: plastic fiber
LanguageData.PlasticFiberResearch.description: Synthetic textile fiber from bio-plastic. Suitable for clothing production and textile crafting.
